mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A .ownerid, pp.deptname , pd.deptcode , pd.deptname as bmdeptname, b.cstcode, b.dname, c.goods, c.spec, c. NAME, c.msunitno, c.producer, c.packnum, D .empname as ywyuan, A .createdate, A .uploadqty, A .memo, A .buyer, A .prc, A .qty2016, A .qty2017, A .lotno, c.marketno, c.complevemark, A .qty201710, A .prc11, a.glbc FROM USER_HN_SELLERUPLOADQTY A, pub_clients b, pub_waredict c, pub_emp D, pub_dept pd, pub_dept pp WHERE A .cstid = b.cstid AND A .goodid = c.goodid AND A .sellerid = D .empid AND A .saledeptid = pd.deptid AND pp.deptid = A .ownerid AND A .ownerid = '1'
AND c. NAME LIKE '${supcode_bth}'
AND b.cstcode = '${goods}'
AND A .sellerid = ${empid} AND A .lotno IS NOT NULL AND ( A .ownerid, A .cstid, A .goodid, A .sellerid, A .saledeptid, A .createdate ) IN ( SELECT ownerid, cstid, goodid, sellerid, saledeptid, MAX (createdate) FROM USER_HN_SELLERUPLOADQTY WHERE A .lotno IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ownerid, cstid, goodid, sellerid, saledeptid ) ) t1 WHERE ROWNUM <= ${page} ) WHERE RN > ${limit}

select count(*) from USER_HN_SELLERUPLOADQTY A, pub_clients b, pub_waredict c, pub_emp D, pub_dept pd, pub_dept pp WHERE A .cstid = b.cstid AND A .goodid = c.goodid AND A .sellerid = D .empid AND A .saledeptid = pd.deptid AND pp.deptid = A .ownerid AND A .ownerid = '1'
AND c. NAME LIKE '${supcode_bth}'
AND b.cstcode = '${goods}'
AND A .sellerid = ${empid} AND A .lotno IS NOT NULL AND ( A .ownerid, A .cstid, A .goodid, A .sellerid, A .saledeptid, A .createdate ) IN ( SELECT ownerid, cstid, goodid, sellerid, saledeptid, MAX (createdate) FROM USER_HN_SELLERUPLOADQTY WHERE A .lotno IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ownerid, cstid, goodid, sellerid, saledeptid )
